import sys

def main():
	n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
	a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
	b = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
	c = []
	for i in range(n):
		c.append((a[i] + b[i]) % n)
	c.sort()
	for i in range(n):
		print(c[i], end=' ')

if __name__ == '__main__':
	main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int,input().split()))[:n]
    b = list(map(int,input().split()))[:n]
    c = []
    for i in range(n):
        c.append((a[i]+b[i])%n)
    c.sort()
    print(*c)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
import sys



def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    b = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    c = []
    for i in range(n):
        c.append((a[i] + b[i]) % n)
    c.sort()
    for i in range(n):
        print(c[i], end=' ')


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = []
    for i in range(n):
        c.append((a[i]+b[i]) % n)
    c.sort()
    print(*c)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
